trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Представляет аудио ввода, связанный с <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Распознаватель речи создает сведения о звуковой вход как часть операции распознавания.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Для доступа к распознаваемым аудио, используйте <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>свойство или <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>метод <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Результат распознавания могут быть созданы на следующие события и методы <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>классы:-событий:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-методы:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>настроек [!IMPORTANT] настроек распознавания типа результата, формируемого распознавания речи эмулированной не содержит распознаваемым аудио.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Для таких recognition результата его <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>возвращает `null` и его <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>метод создает исключение.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о распознавании речи эмулированной см. в разделе `EmulateRecognize` и `EmulateRecognizeAsync` методы <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>классы.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает расположение во входном потоке аудио для начала распознаваемым аудио.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Это свойство ссылается на позицию в начале распознанной фразы в созданный аудиопотока устройство ввода.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: В отличие от этого `RecognizerAudioPosition` свойства <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>и <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>классы ссылки распознавателя позицию в его звукового ввода.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Эти позиции могут быть разными.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [с помощью событий распознавания речи](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>Свойство получает системного времени в начале операции распознавания.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Расположение в потоке входных аудио для начала распознаваемым аудио.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает продолжительность входного звукового потока для распознанных аудио.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Длительность в входной аудиопоток распознаваемым аудио.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает формат аудио, обработанных подсистемой распознавания.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Формат аудио, обрабатываемых распознавания речи.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Выбирает и возвращает часть текущего распознан аудио как двоичные данные.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Начальная точка звуковых данных должны быть возвращены.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Длина сегмента должны быть возвращены.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает подраздел распознаваемым звука в соответствии с определением audioPosition и duration .

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositionи duration определения сегмента звука вне диапазона текущего сегмента.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Текущий распознал, что аудио не содержит данных.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает системное время в начале операции распознавания.

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Свойство StartTime возвращает системное время в начале операции распознавания, который можно использовать для вычисления задержки и производительности.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>Свойство получает расположение устройства ввода созданный аудиопотока.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Системное время в начале операции распознавания.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Записывает весь аудио поток как необработанные данные.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Звуковые данные записываются в `outputStream` в двоичной форме.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Нет сведения о заголовке включено.

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Метод WriteToAudioStream использует формат звукозаписи, но не включает Заголовок волнового файла.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы включить Заголовок волнового файла, используйте <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>метод.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Поток, который получит звуковых данных.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Записывает в поток в формате Wave аудио.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Звуковые данные записываются в `outputStream` в формате Wave, которая содержит заголовок ресурса файла обмена формат RIFF ().

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>Метод используется один и тот же двоичный формат, но не включает Заголовок волнового файла.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Поток, который получит звуковых данных.
